entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 15.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
